subject: Order from Dec 31
description_text:
Good evening,

I just wanted to send this email to ease my own mind, as I had placed an order for sim pedals on December 31st, and the website said I would receive a text/email with updates but haven’t received anything at the time of sending this email. I assume that with the holidays and everything that it probably affects things, however I had ordered the rest of my rig from other sites and got confirmations within 30 minutes so I just wanted to follow up and make sure everything was okay on both ends. 

Kind regards,
Jeremiah McLean
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeremiah Montgomery,  Please provide the recipient’s information, order amount, order date, and destination country. Once the payment is successfully completed, we will ship orders in sequence according to the order timeline.
